Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Bandama Golf Hotel in Santa Brigida, you'll be by the ocean and close to Viera y Clavijo Botanical Garden. This golf hotel is within the vicinity of Estadio Gran Canaria and University of Las Palmas.

Rooms
Stay in one of 25 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
While the golfer in the family is out on the course, try one of the other recreational amenities offered, such as an outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Bandama Golf Hotel. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include multilingual staff, a safe deposit box at the front desk, and coffee/tea in the lobby. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Bandama Golf Hotel. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Viera y Clavijo Botanical Garden - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Estadio Gran Canaria - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
University of Las Palmas - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Canarian Museum - 8.8 km / 5.4 mi
Cathedral of Santa Ana - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Museo Diocesano de Arte Sacro - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Casa Museo de Colon - 8.9 km / 5.6 mi
Casa Museo Perez Galdos - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Teatro Perez Galdos - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Parque San Telmo - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Plaza La Feria - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi
Fuente Luminosa - 10 km / 6.2 mi
Pueblo Canario - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Museo Nestor - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Parque Doramas - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi

The preferred airport for Bandama Golf Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
